Challenge:

ClickFire Media was tasked with developing a series of flash banner ad takeovers for BBDO and their client, GE Appliances.

Execution:

CFMâ€™s first task was to organize a full two-day stop-motion food shoot, including bringing in several professional food stylists. We produced seven unique rich media banner ads, using the stop-motion footage from our in-house studio shoot. These ads visually showed how the battle for finding space in the refrigerator was over once you had a GE refrigerator. Each ad consisted of food flying around and fitting nicely into a full GE refrigerator. All the ads were created using a combination of Photoshop, After Effects and Flash. Results: Successfully organized a full two-day stop-motion food shoot Created and executed the banners on time and within budget.
